nodes.text: The Royal Command Bunker was located on the planet Mon Cala. After being requested by Governor Wilhuff Tarkin to secure King Lee-Char so that the Galactic Empire's invasion of Mon Cala could be ended quicker, Darth Vader traveled to the bunker to acquire the king. After disposing of his guards, Vader secured Lee-Char before he was confronted by Jedi Padawan Ferren Barr. After Barr's death and Lee-Char confirmed his surrender to Tarkin, Vader and Lee-Char were picked up from the bunker by a shuttle.
